Title: Regulates cadmium in substrate components in children's jewelry
Summary: Regulates cadmium in substrate components of children's jewelry; provides that no children's jewelry shall be sold or distributed in this state that contains cadmium in accessible metal or plastic substrate components exceeding certain levels.
LawCode: Add ยง1376-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to regulating cadmium in substrate components of children's jewelry
